name: FL3R Randavatar
author: Armando "FL3R" Fiore

sections.description:
This plugin provides a large randomly assembled avatar for each user based on their email address. When a user comments on the site, the plugin generates a unique avatar based on his email. There are an impressive number of avatars that can be generated, and it increases at each update of the plugin!

Donate

If you like this plugin, you consider making a small donation. Thanks. https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=WFLPUGCW9EJVJ

My plugins

FL3R FeelBox: https://wordpress.org/plugins/fl3r-feelbox/

FL3R User Agent Comments: https://wordpress.org/plugins/fl3r-user-agent-comments/

FL3R Randavatar: https://wordpress.org/plugins/fl3r-randavatar/
sections.installation:
1. Download and unzip the plugin file.
  2. Upload “fl3r-randavatar” folder into your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Make sure the ‘avatar’ folder is [writable].
  4. Go to the Plugins section of your WordPress admin panel and activate the FL3R Randavatar.
  5. And that’s all folks!
sections.faq: A FAQ section is available from the FL3R Randavatar Settings page. If you have more questions, contact me on Twitter (@Armando_Fiore), Facebook (Armando.FL3R.Fiore) or Google+ (+ArmandoFiore).

short_description: Creates a unique avatar for each commenter based on email address, with godzillion of generated avatars!
